node.description: In a world where disappointment and disaster are normal, how can you have hope in a future? The Bible speaks of a time when sin and sadness will be no more. A place where disaster and disappointment have gone ( Heaven ). Is there an hope of us reaching this place? Jesus spoke about it and the disciples believed in it so much they gave their life with hope. Christ has promised never to leave us or forsake us. He cares for His own. One day Jesus will return at the second coming and all of life's trials will fade into insignificance in the light of His glory. Join Mark Finley as HopeLives365 presents a live church sermon from the Living Hope Seventh-day Adventist Church.
